message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm asking for $180 to start.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you do $150?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your position. I am willing to go up to $120 for the product.
